name: React Pandemic Board Game
description: Before the world had ever heard of COVID-19, there was a cooperative strategy game called Pandemic. As a real-life global pandemic raged on, I built my own app version of the popular game to practice writing custom objects, methods, and React components.

name: Select-4
description: An online lottery app created for a web development bootcamp group project. My role in this project was to handle everything data-related, from deciding how data would flow throughout the app to creating models in Sequelize to seeding the database. I also wrote RESTful APIs to allow connecting the database to the React front-end.

name: React User Directory
description: This simple app was built as a proof-of-concept React app. It demos the functionality of a user directory but fetching a sample of profiles from the Random User API, and allowing for sorting and filtering of those users. It was refactored from a vanilla JS to a React app.

name: E-Commerce Back End
description: Data models and routes that could be used as a back-end for a small retail company. Data models allow for the creation of Categories, Products, and Tags. Routes allow the user to view, create, and edit Categories, Products, and Tags.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A simple weather dashboard that allows a user to look up current and future weather conditions based on city name. The user's last ten searches will persist in local storage and be shown on the page.

name: Password Generator
description: Best practices for web security tell us to use passwords that are hard to guess and to use a different password for each page or app we use. This app will generate a random password for the user, given criteria such as which character types to use and length of desired password

name: Fullstack Bet
description: An online hub for European Football information, including upcoming games and team stats. In this collaborative project, my role was to use JavaScriptâ€™s Fetch API and a third-party Soccer API to show the user stats on upcoming matches.
